spec: we need to augment the guards mechanism to introduce an @Public annotation for endpoints that are open to the public such as the signup endpoint in the auth controller
commitMessage:
Added @Public decorator and global JWT guard

- Created new @Public decorator for marking public endpoints
- Modified JwtAuthGuard to check for @Public decorator
- Applied JwtAuthGuard globally in AppModule
- Marked public endpoints with @Public decorator:
  - /api/auth/signup
  - /api/auth/token
  - /api/monitoring/health
  - /api/users
